short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Plant Trees For Free While Searching The Web

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🌿 Ever wished your online searches could make a positive impact on the planet? Now, with Search For Trees, your every click contributes to planting trees for free!

🔍 Powered by the Google search engine, Search For Trees delivers top-notch search results, ensuring you get the information you need while making a real difference for the environment.

💚 Why Choose Search For Trees?
✅Better Search Results: Enjoy the best search results from the world's leading search engine.
✅ Tree-Planting while Searching: Simply by using with Search For Trees, you're actively supporting reforestation efforts around the globe.
✅ Sustainable Searching: Embrace eco-friendly habits by seamlessly integrating sustainability into your daily web routine.

🌲 How It Works:
1️⃣ Add Search For Trees to Chrome for FREE.
2️⃣ Conduct your usual searches 
3️⃣ The tree counter increases when you search for a while

🌍 Why Trees Matter:
Deforestation contributes over 10% of global greenhouse gas emissions. By choosing Search For Trees, you're actively participating in the fight against climate change.

🌳 The Project
At Search For Trees, we believe in making a lasting impact. That's why Trees for The Future (Trees.org) is among the projects that we support. This is an incredible NGO dedicated to creating agroforestry systems across Africa. By integrating tree planting with economic value for local farmers, this NGO not only contributes to reforestation but also uplifts communities. With your help, our searches not only plant trees but also foster sustainable livelihoods and empower farmers to build a greener and more prosperous future.

🔍  Search For Trees vs. Ecosia:
While we wholeheartedly appreciate Ecosia's commitment to tree planting through online searches, Search For Trees uses a different search engine (Google) giving usually better results. We hold immense admiration for Ecosia's dedication to environmental causes, and our mission is aligned in making the web a greener space. So if you stick with Ecosia, we're totally fine as well :-).

🛒 Beyond Browsing:
Would you also like to plant trees while shopping online? Check out our sister extension, TreeClicks, to continue supporting tree planting initiatives with shopping online.

🎉 Join the Green Movement:
Be a part of the sustainable search revolution! Together, we can make a significant impact on our planet's future, one search at a time.

🌿 Install Search For Trees now and turn your searches into a force for positive change. It's time to browse with purpose! 🌐🌳 #SearchForTrees #SustainableSearch #GreenWeb
